channel.title: Rate my site!
channel.description:
any browser :P
http://progjex.com
please comment and rate please.
its approved , i will show proof if i have to
the images are kind of big cause their quality is maxiunum 12 in photoshop

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @Braille Braille
item.description:
@Braille wrote:

Use a 1*500 image of a gradient, making the bottom colour the same as what you set the background to be, then repeat-x, makes it much easier, rahter than 10000 heh. Also it’s a nice size for the content but if it’s for resolution reasons no-one runs…640 anymore, most sites are built for 1024 minimum now. However I do like the banner.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @welshy welshy
item.description:
@welshy wrote:

if your using a gradient… do this… make it 1x10000 or w/e then use the repeat x and set the background color to the same color as the end gradient

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“OnlyOneRule, post:5, topic:129283”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=179899.msg1644939#msg1644939 date=1186013969]
Sorry the background gives me shivers. Don’t put the Valid CSS button if you can’t put the Valid XHTML button, because then it’s obvious you can’t get valid XHTML. The buttons are rather pixelated and HUGE.
[/quote]

ive noticed that on all his website he likes using big buttons, its sort of his style… i see nothing wrong with them, the only thing i dont like is the background and the fact that none of the pages are made

another thing, think you can make it the same with as your advertisement at the bottom? that will make it look allot better[/quote]

i will later but not now cause im lazy <3

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @OnlyOneRule OnlyOneRule
item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Sorry the background gives me shivers. Don’t put the Valid CSS button if you can’t put the Valid XHTML button, because then it’s obvious you can’t get valid XHTML. The buttons are rather pixelated and HUGE.

ive noticed that on all his website he likes using big buttons, its sort of his style… i see nothing wrong with them, the only thing i dont like is the background and the fact that none of the pages are made

another thing, think you can make it the same width as your advertisement at the bottom? that will make it look allot better

Read full topic
